DarkMouse::

She heard the transmission. She sighed and opened her link. She was 
getting bored and had nothing better to do. She listened and 
laughed. "Get a load of this guy. He thinks he can actually go around 
and make us surrender just by threats?" She laughed. "Oh I got to 
reply to this one."  She turned on her link, but sent the signal 
through the atmosphere to block it's origins. She then replied to 
this bot. She stuck out her tongue at her link,"FFFBBBBRRRRTTTTT" 
Then disconnected the transmission. She fell on the floor laughing.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Bounty opened a channel on all frequencies, "I am a security 
officer 
> of the temporal sciences law enforcement agency. All beings not of 
> this world are ordered to report to my ship to unconditionally 
> surrender or Be hunted down like the animals you transform into, 
You 
> have six hours to comply or I will do this the hard way. He paused 
> hoping for a quick response, "I do hope you prefer the hard way." 
he 
> landed by his ship and waited for the flocks of bots to return and 
> surrender.
>
